This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Seen and pictured 3 UFOs from Fort Lauderdale's beach on Sep-15-2008
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
divs: Sighting DetailsThere isn't a lot of description I can give, other than I saw three light-emitting objects hovering over the ocean, maybe a mile or two from where I was, off of Fort Lauderdale's beach on September 15, 2008, and that I took several pictures of which I hereby attach three (3). The first picture, sequentially numbered DSC00066 by my camera, shows one bright round bulb-light object, which could erroneously be taken for Venus, and two fuzzy orange objects at the top-left and bottom-left of the picture. The next image, numbered DSC00067, doesn't show the top-left orange object anymore, shows the one at the bottom-left considerably up and above from its position in the previous picture, and the bright round bulb-light object has not moved. At the last photograph, # DSC00070, the orange-colored objects had disappeared from sight, and the bright round bulb-light object had moved up and to the left of its previous position, now displaying a strange earring-like shape, emitting bright yellow light from its top and bright white light from its bottom. This item, when magnified, suggests a horizontal dish-like shape with small window-like lights on both of its sides. The untouched files, as transferred directly from my camera to my PC are available for analysis. I would greatly appreciate expert or sound comments into what it is that I saw that evening. I'm no expert, just a curious individual.
